meanings.sent1: The misaddressed letter was returned to the sender.
meanings.sent2: The misaddressed package ended up at the neighbor's house.
meanings.sent3: The misaddressed invitation caused confusion among the guests.
meanings.sent4: Her misaddressed email led to a mix-up in communication.
meanings.sent5: The misaddressed envelope had the wrong zip code written on it.

meanings.definition: To send to the wrong address.
meanings.sent1: I accidentally misaddressed the package and it got lost in the mail.
meanings.sent2: She misaddressed the letter, causing a delay in delivery.
meanings.sent3: The postman misaddressed the parcel to a different street.
meanings.sent4: He misaddressed the invitation, resulting in it being returned.
meanings.sent5: The secretary misaddressed the memo, causing confusion in the office.
